document.full_text: yemenis on thursday commemorated dozens of people killed in weeks of street protests demanding president ali abdullah saleh resign, while efforts continued to negotiate his exit from power within the next year.
document.title: yemen protesters remember dead with talks stalled
lines_and_colors: yemenis on thursday commemorated dozens of people killed in weeks of street protests demanding president ali abdullah saleh resign, while efforts continued to negotiate his exit from power within the next year.
